root.name: Bug Hunt
root.description: A one or two player (pass play) game, Bug Hunt presents the player with a 4x2 grid representing a circuit board. As "bugs", literally insects, begin to infest the board the player must shoot the bugs using the XG-1 light gun to complete the wave. The game tracks hits, bullets fired and overall accuracy. Points are scored based on the different enemy types, with large static spiders offering fewer points than small mobile ticks. The games ends if the player fails to maintain the minimum accuracy rating for the wave, usually around 40%, or when the player completes all seven waves. Upon completion or failure the player is graded and given a rank ranging from CEO (for poor performance) to Engineer.
